summary: Build a bold, adventurous web app study planner called "Conquer Your Studies: Your Epic Learning Journey" with a Strategic Battle Plan (war-map) UI, color-coded study zones, a Divide and Conquer task breakdown section, and a closing motivational quote.
architectural_notes: UI theme: "Strategic Battle Plan" / war-map aesthetic with bold, adventurous styling.
Use defined color mapping for subject/topic status and sections: Red=Mission Critical, Blue=Tactical Drills, Green=Victory Zone, Yellow=Scouting.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Parchment-style war map background texture with subtle grid and compass rose (war-map-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Bold adventurous emblem/badge icon set: sword, shield, flag, compass (battle-icons.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide header banner with "Strategic Battle Plan" aesthetic (battle-banner.dim_1600x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create the app shell and primary navigation for "Conquer Your Studies: Your Epic Learning Journey" with two main areas: (1) a War Map-style syllabus dashboard and (2) a "Divide and Conquer" task breakdown section.

Implement a consistent "Strategic Battle Plan" visual theme that is bold and adventurous, including typography, spacing, and UI styling, and enforce the provided section color system across the interface: Red=Mission Critical (difficult/high-priority), Blue=Tactical Drills (revision/practice tests), Green=Victory Zone (completed), Yellow=Scouting (new topics).

Build the "War Map of the syllabus" dashboard UI that presents syllabus items as map-like nodes/territories, showing each itemâ€™s current status (Scouting, Mission Critical, Tactical Drills, Victory Zone) using the defined color-coded styling and labels.

Implement the "Divide and Conquer" section UI to select a syllabus chapter/topic and break it into smaller tasks, with the ability to create, view, update, and mark tasks as completed (moving them into the Victory Zone status).

Display the provided motivational quote at the end of the primary user flow/interface (e.g., at the bottom of the Dashboard and/or as a dedicated closing section), using prominent styling consistent with the bold/adventurous theme.
Add required generated static art assets to support the War Map/Battle Plan look, and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images from the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: War-map style syllabus dashboard (Strategic Battle Plan) with bold/adventurous UI
Color-coded zones/sections: Red=Mission Critical, Blue=Tactical Drills, Green=Victory Zone (completed), Yellow=Scouting (new topics)
"Divide and Conquer" section to break chapters into small tasks
Display the provided motivational quote at the end of the interface/flow

Add backend persistence for syllabus items and tasks with status values that support the four strategic zones (Scouting, Mission Critical, Tactical Drills, Victory Zone), and expose query/update methods consumed by the frontend via React Query.
